item.description:
Have you had this conversation with yourself and/or with others?

"I know what I want. I use LOA principles diligently. I'm great at manifesting the little things & some bigger ones. However, with some of the bigger issues & dreams I have…well, when I notice what I want is not showing up yet, I get frustrated, I feel bummed.

I know I shouldn't focus on the lack. Yes, I know I need to let go & not be too detached to the outcome. Yet I can't seem to be able to let go completely or feel less frustrated. What if I can't or have a difficult time letting go? What if I continuously feel bummed out? Does this mean I'll just never attract what I want? Maybe it's not meant to be."

Yuliya Cohen, BostonLOA member and Energy Healer, assures us that the difficulties we experience with the process of letting go are not our fault. You can still get what you want, without having to let go & detach from your "low energy" feelings, limiting beliefs & your desired outcome. She'll share with you how you can "recycle" the negative or stuck feelings you have & still come out a winner!

Hmm....doesn't this contradict the principles of the Law Of Attraction? Join us to find out. Take your practice of the Law OF Attraction to a new level as we explore the nature of duality.

" Duality is the nature of any quality.
Opposites complement each other
instead of competing with each other
— they are two faces of the same coin —
one cannot exist without the other.


When you perceive that no quality in itself is good or bad,
the right and wrong game in your mind will wind down
and you will enter an inner world of peace and balance. "

- Taoist teachings




About Yuliya Cohen:
www.yuliyacohen.com
Brookline, MA

Yuliya Cohen is a trained energy healer, medical intuitive and therapist, and the creator of the Energy Restructuring™ System. She received her training from the HLCC "Crucible" program, directed by Rev. Rosalyn Bruyere, a world-renowned healer, scholar & researcher in the field of Energy Healing.

Yuliya was formerly an engineer & computer science researcher (including work at Siemens Research and Technology Laboratories) and holds degrees in Civil Engineering from the Kiev School of Civil Engineering & in Computer Science from Brandeis University.
